Package org.openrtk.idl.epp0503.host

Interface Summary
epp_HostCheck Master external interface for the implementor of the EPP Host Check command.
epp_HostCheckOperations Internal IDL interface which is never referenced externally.
epp_HostCreate Master external interface for the implementor of the EPP Host Create command.
epp_HostCreateOperations Internal IDL interface which is never referenced externally.
epp_HostDelete Master external interface for the implementor of the EPP Host Delete command.
epp_HostDeleteOperations Internal IDL interface which is never referenced externally.
epp_HostInfo Master external interface for the implementor of the EPP Host Info command.
epp_HostInfoOperations Internal IDL interface which is never referenced externally.
epp_HostUpdate Master external interface for the implementor of the EPP Host Update command.
epp_HostUpdateOperations Internal IDL interface which is never referenced externally.
 

Class Summary
epp_HostAddress Class that contains the elements used to represent host IP addresses with the type: IPV4, IPV6.
epp_HostAddressType Class defining constant instances of IP address types for host.
epp_HostCheckReq Class that contains the elements necessary to check to see if a host is available in the registry.
epp_HostCheckRsp Class that contains the elements used to represent the host check response from the EPP server.
epp_HostCreateReq Class that contains the elements necessary to create a host in the registry.
epp_HostCreateRsp Class that contains the elements used to represent the host create response from the EPP server.
epp_HostDeleteReq Class that contains the elements necessary to delete a host in the registry.
epp_HostDeleteRsp Class that contains the elements used to represent the host delete response from the EPP server.
epp_HostInfoReq Class that contains the elements necessary to retrieve detailed information associated with a host object in the registry.
epp_HostInfoRsp Class that contains the elements used to represent the host info response from the EPP server.
epp_HostStatus Class that contains the elements used to represent host status with different type.
epp_HostStatusType Class defining constant instances of status types for host.
epp_HostUpdateAddRemove Class that contains the elements to be added into or removed from the host object in the registry.
epp_HostUpdateChange Class that contains the host object elements to be changed in the registry.
epp_HostUpdateReq Class that contains the elements necessary to modify a host in the registry.
epp_HostUpdateRsp Class that contains the elements used to represent the host update response from the EPP server.
